alert.note: Alert for Clark (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 12 at 2:54PM PDT until August 12 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Eastern Las Vegas including Nellis, Las Vegas Bay, Henderson, and Frenchman Mountain. * WHEN...Until 430 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 253 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Henderson, The Motor Speedway, Nellis AFB, East Las Vegas, Lake Las Vegas, Las Vegas Bay, Las Vegas Bay Campground, Sunrise Mtn, Frenchman Mtn and Gass Pk. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
